mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMMENT (COMMENT_NO, BOARD_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_BORADCOMMENTNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo}, #{commentContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD_COMMENT WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD_COMMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
